stories.Title: Nuclear energy pioneers
stories.Description: China's ambitious nuclear project takes a leap forward with the successful installation of the core module for its small modular reactor.
stories.Tweet: Nuclear energy pioneers 📦 China's ambitious nuclear project takes a leap forward with the successful installation of the core module for its small modular reactor. #china https://interestingengineering.com/innovation/core-module-small-modular-reactor-completed-china

stories.Title: Intel recognizes Figure's potential
stories.Description: Figure's humanoid development caught Intel Capital's attention, leading to a $9 million equity investment. A partnership that propels the company's journey to redefine robotics boundaries.
stories.Tweet: Intel recognizes Figure's potential 📦 Figure's humanoid development caught Intel Capital's attention, leading to a $9 million equity investment. A partnership that propels the company's journey to redefine robotics boundaries. #robotics https://techcrunch.com/2023/07/17/intel-backs-figures-humanoid-robot-to-the-tune-of-9-million/

stories.Title: The promise of quantum computing
stories.Description: Quantum computing's transformative power comes with uncertainties. How can we navigate the challenges and ensure a smooth transition to harnessing its full potential?
stories.Tweet: The promise of quantum computing 📦 Quantum computing's transformative power comes with uncertainties. How can we navigate the challenges and ensure a smooth transition to harnessing its full potential? #science https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-023-02317-x

stories.Title: Meet PIGINet
stories.Description: MIT researchers have developed a machine learning system that helps household robots find feasible solutions faster, bringing efficiency and convenience to smart homes.
stories.Tweet: Meet PIGINet 📦 MIT researchers have developed a machine learning system that helps household robots find feasible solutions faster, bringing efficiency and convenience to smart homes. #robotics https://piginet.github.io/

stories.Title: Building trust in AI
stories.Description: As AI technologies advance, the need for interpretability grows. Understanding the reasons behind its decisions promotes transparency, accountability, and ethical compliance.
stories.Tweet: Building trust in AI 📦 As AI technologies advance, the need for interpretability grows. Understanding the reasons behind its decisions promotes transparency, accountability, and ethical compliance. #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/the-secret-to-enterprise-ai-success-make-it-understandable-and-trustworthy/

stories.Title: A new era in neurosurgery
stories.Description: Hong Kong's Centre for AI and Robotics (CAIR) introduces MicroNeuro, an AI-powered robotic system for minimally invasive neurosurgery, that enhances surgical precision and reduces tissue damage.
stories.Tweet: A new era in neurosurgery 📦 Hong Kong's Centre for AI and Robotics (CAIR) introduces MicroNeuro, an AI-powered robotic system for minimally invasive neurosurgery, that enhances surgical precision and reduces tissue damage. #ai https://interestingengineering.com/innovation/chinas-ai-powered-robot-promises-minimally-invasive-brain-surgeries

stories.Title: Humans are crucial to AI
stories.Description: In the AI age, our choices shape the course of technology. From tech companies to regulators and consumers, we have the responsibility to set limits and ensure it benefits everyone.
stories.Tweet: Humans are crucial to AI 📦 In the AI age, our choices shape the course of technology. From tech companies to regulators and consumers, we have the responsibility to set limits and ensure it benefits everyone. #ai https://www.axios.com/2023/07/17/ai-revolution-human-decisions-chatgpt

stories.Title: Destination: Space!
stories.Description: Virgin Galactic is gearing up for its first private passenger flight, launching on August 10th. The courageous crew includes an Olympian and a mother-daughter duo.
stories.Tweet: Destination: Space!  📦 Virgin Galactic is gearing up for its first private passenger flight, launching on August 10th. The courageous crew includes an Olympian and a mother-daughter duo. #virgingalactic https://www.engadget.com/virgin-galactics-first-private-passenger-spaceflight-will-launch-as-soon-as-august-10th-151531488.html

stories.Title: Rolling into the next iPhone
stories.Description: Apple's latest patent unveils a rollable device concept. With potential advancements in screen technology, it seems that the company aims to make rolling phones a reality.
stories.Tweet: Rolling into the next iPhone 📦 Apple's latest patent unveils a rollable device concept. stories.Title: Great news for Mac enthusiasts
stories.Description: According to Mark Gurman's recent newsletter, Apple is reportedly set to launch its first M3 Apple Silicon Macs in October, showcasing cutting-edge technology and enhanced capabilities.

stories.Title: From Texas to the world
stories.Description: The "first Cybertruck" has been officially built at Gigafactory Texas. The highly anticipated electric pickup is one step closer to hitting the roads.
